title: Eridan_world
author: Eridan_world
content: Hello everyone. Some accounts have cool signatures, so I thought about how can I make one for myself. Maybe there is some service to create a signature? Or is it making in some other way? I couldn't find anything suitable on the forum yet.

comments.author: jackg
comments.body: I don't think newbies can wear a signature so you'll have to wait until you get to Jr member or higher (higher ranks unlock styling, Jr member just get text i think).I think there are some bbcode designers available online but a lot look quite hard to use (from when I last looked for one).

comments.author: BlackHatCoiner
comments.body: Unfortunately for you, customized signature is going to be hell of a journey. If you didn't know, you need special ranks to wear things like personal avatars or signatures, and even then you have certain limitations (i.e., max image size 120x80, signature can't contain images). That's because, apparently, as you can see yourself, we nearly all wear advertisements-- which as you understand promises an income. Read the requirements for acquiring ranks: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=178608.0

I couldn't find anything suitable on the forum yet.Here is a list of some useful topics that will help you learn: - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=4738016.0 - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=4970111.0 After completing it, you can move on to this topic ---> [LEARN] BBCode Lessons & Tutorials [+tutorial videos!]Creating signatures is not easy because it is done at the level of using █░ to create something useful.

comments.author: Cuda911
comments.body: You already have 31 activity, with one merit you will rank to jr member and you will be able to wear signature codes, you need to improve your post quality to get merited.

Here's the link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=4536961.msg40828830#msg40828830Please use Google or another machine to translate it. Hopefully, the results of the translation you can still understand.Note:Newbies (other than Copper members) cannot use signatures on their accounts. In the "Forum Profile Information", there will be no column to input the signature.Quote from: theymos on September 23, 2018, 08:58:25 PM-snip-Users of Newbie rank cannot post images or wear signatures. If you want to do these things, then you can either rank up (explained above) or pay for a copper membership.

comments.author: AakZaki
comments.body: all the ways may have been explained by other members. but whether your goal is just to create a signature code and sell it or just curious about how to make it. You need to upgrade your account to experiment on your own account. many bbcode signature designers receive services for making special signatures, because it is quite difficult to make it, it requires understanding HTML code.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Quote from: Eridan_world on August 31, 2022, 07:02:40 PMHello everyone. Some accounts have cool signatures, so I thought about how can I make one for myself. Maybe there is some service to create a signature? Or is it making in some other way? I couldn't find anything suitable on the forum yet.Like you've been told already, only from the rank of junior member and higher can you start wearing signatures, and at a junior member rank, your signature will be nothing other than plane text, as you advance in rank, you unlock the power to wear signatures that styled both OK color and text and images, in different forms.You wanna learn how to create signatures, then you should learn bbcode, which is the coding language used for creating signatures, you can find courses on this online on different platforms, and as my personal recommendation, I would say you should try udemy.If you are looking for a user to pay to create a signature for you?, then check the service board, there are tons of user with such skills, and to cap it up, it doesn't cost much by the way.

comments.author: Bhig Daddy
comments.body: Well it so unfortunate for you then, because newbies are not allowed to wear signature, you have to get a rank to move to Jr. Member rank or higher and all you need to do before being ranked up it by getting merit, and you gain merit when you post useful information or something that benefit the forum. So post something meaningful and earn yourself a merit.

There are many topics that direct you on how you can gain merit through quality posts on the forum like this one  so have a look on them and improve your knowledge on the forum.There is lot of support from members to newbies with knowledge and share something good and qualitative through their contribution.There are some threads by @Ognasty and @Ratimov on this B&H help board only where you can get your first few merits and next rank if you follow the instruction.So getting next rank is in your hands as it's not some sort of giveaway so understand this merit system working.
